response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. Given its importance to you, I understand its worth is $1,000,000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a favorable discount. I trust you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you throughout this process.", "product_price": 950000}
